text: Currently the easiest way is to pull your files locally using the local CLI tools and doing a search there
Hello, I've created a global group and when i add that to my landing pages template i get  "Missing Template at Path:" path to global group
Does someone knows what can be going on?

In one of my portals, global modules were reverted back to the older interface (where editing controls arent in a new tab). But it also looks like changes to the module arent being pushed live. Is anyone having similar issues?
